import React ,{useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import './details.css'; import axios from 'axios'; // "place": "Tayyib al Ism", // "description": "Tayyib-Ism is a small town in north-western Saudi Arabia in the province of Tabuk. It is located in the upland area", // "adultPrice": "750", // "childPrice": "400", // "pickupLocation": "Reception at Tabuk Airport (Prince Sultan bin Abdulaziz) at 18:45", // "returnsAt": "2021-06-12T07:52:19.903Z", // "departsAt": "2021-06-12T07:52:19.903Z", // "image": "https://www.hiamag.com/sites/default/files/media/blog/11/DST_1370142_1943469_202007132032402068_0.jpg", // "included": { // "tourGuide": true, // "transport": true, // "entiranceFees": false, // "pickUpAndDrop": true, // "food": true, // "tourId": 2 const AddTour = () => { const [place, setPlace] = useState("") const [description, setDescription] = useState("") const [adultPrice, setAdultPrice] = useState("") const [childPrice, setChildPrice] = useState("") // const [childPrice, setChildPrice] = useState("") const [pickupLocation, setPickupLocation] = useState("") const [returnsAt, setReturnsAt] = useState("") const [departsAt, setDepartsAt] = useState("") const [image, setImage] = useState("") const [tourGuide, setTourGuide] = useState("") const [transport, setTransport] = useState("") const [entiranceFees, setEntiranceFees] = useState("") const [pickUpAndDrop, setPickUpAndDrop] = useState("") const [food, setFood] = useState("") const [tourId, setTourId] = useState("") return ( <>

Welcome!

Please provide the place information below.

setPlace(e.target.value)} />
setAdultPrice(e.target.value)} />
setChildPrice(e.target.value)} />
setDepartsAt(e.target.value)} />
setReturnsAt(e.target.value)} />
setImage(e.target.value)} />
setPickupLocation(e.target.value)} />
); }; export default AddTour;
